thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 17 of 539
thread.title: Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text: At first I was slightly skeptical of PromGirl because they had such a vast variety of dresses to choose from. It seemed like it must be another scam site. However, my friend had ordered from here previously and been satisfied with her order so I decided to give it a shot. My dress came in on the exact day that they estimated and it fit wonderfully. It was just as the picture had shown and great quality.
